data.eml:eml: Bembidion (? Nipponobembidion) ruruy sp. n., a new brachypterous ground beetle (Coleoptera, Carabidae) from Kunashir Island, Kuriles, Russia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Makarov, Kirill V., Sundukov, Yuri N. (2014): Bembidion (? Nipponobembidion) ruruy sp. n., a new brachypterous ground beetle (Coleoptera, Carabidae) from Kunashir Island, Kuriles, Russia. ZooKeys 463: 75-93, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.463.8504, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.463.8504
